snippet: It is a school of last chances, both for its students and for the fading art that they are learning, stitch by stitch....

headline.main: Klopp Urges Inconsistent Liverpool to Get Back on Track
headline.print_headline: Klopp Urges Inconsistent Liverpool to Get Back on Track

lead_paragraph: It is a school of last chances, both for its students and for the fading art that they are learning, stitch by stitch.
